text: Nivola is a literary genre invented by Spanish author Miguel de Unamuno. Nivola may also refer to: * Rito della Nivola, a Catholic rite and historical reenactment held in Milan, Italy * Alessandro Nivola (born 1972), an American actor * Costantino Nivola (1911–1988), an Italian sculptor * Tazio Nuvolari (1892–1953), nicknamed Nivola, an Italian racing driver * Nivola Museum, a museum in Italy dedicated to Costantino Nivola
title: Nivola (disambiguation)
